Articles.Content:
So i have been playing with the new expansion and could not complete mission "Test RT-5 "flea" solid rocket booster at launch site. And i was wondering why. I was using the RT-5 flea painted which was added in the expansios with all the other painted parts. And the contracts would only complete if the equipment was used from base game and not the expansion. I don't know if that's a bug or if it's in the game made that way but it was pretty anoying. It's not a mod or anything anfter all, it's officialy supported and developed content.

So is it a bug or just made that way?

The Flea is not part of Making History.

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Making_History_parts

Welcome to the forum, @PsykoloGG.

I tested this in my stock install with the flea variants and the contract completed successfully for all 3.

Any suggestions why would the painted versions of stock engines would not work? I have no mods at all. Also it was weird that it shows duplicate parts except that one is painted and other is stock game.

1 hour ago, PsykoloGG said:

Also it was weird that it shows duplicate parts except that one is painted and other is stock game.

I also don't see that in my game.  If you have the steam version you can check to see if your game files are OK:

Quote
  1. From the Library section, right-click on the game and select Properties from the menu.
  2. Select the Local files tab and click the Verify integrity of game files... button.
  3. Steam will verify the game's files - this process may take several minutes.
Okay thank you i'll report back when i will try that
Verifying game files did work. I thought it was a bug because i just downloaded the game and it was already corrupted. It works very good now and everything is fixed. Thank you all for help.
